Content.Text:
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning <MYNAME>. What's wrong?
You need to speak up when you greet
people!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You've got thin arms,
<MYNAME>. Are you eating right?
<PAGE>
We can't have the person who's supposed
to fix up this town be a weakling. You
should train or something.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning <MYNAME>. How's your
work on the town going?
<PAGE>
If you follow my blueprints you should
be able to create something amazing.
Keep at it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it <MYNAME>? Do you need
something from me? Go ahead and spit it
out.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? If you see
Tony making mischief around town, don't
hesitate to scold him.
<PAGE>
That kid just hasn't been listening to
me recently. I'm counting on you to
keep him in line.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. How goes the work on
the farm? What do you mean "it's
alright"?
<PAGE>
You need to speak more clearly. I don't
like vague answers.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is that you, <MYNAME>? I'm so
tired. My shoulders are stiff from
thinking about blueprints all day long.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Can you massage me a bit? It couldn't
hurt could it? Just a little.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ahhh, that feels real good. You're good
at this, <MYNAME>. Thanks. I feel
much better now.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's going on, <MYNAME>? Why are
you coming to talk to me at this hour?
Is there an emergency?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's the adult's time now. Children
should go home and sleep. Don't blame
me if you can't wake up tomorrow.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>.
The weather's great today isn't it?
<PAGE>
When it's this clear and beautiful out,
I feel good on the inside too.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey <MYNAME>. Depressing rain
isn't it? I washed Tony's muddy clothes
but I can't even hang them out to dry.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. The
summer sun is hot isn't it? I feel like
swimming in a river or something.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey <MYNAME>. It'd be nice if
today's rain made it cooler tomorrow,
wouldn't it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Howdy, <MYNAME>. They say fall
makes people hungry right? Tony's been
eating a lot recently.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>As a parent, I'm happy, but feeding him
is costing me a lot of money. I've got
to figure out how to cut some costs.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's going on, <MYNAME>? Why are
you out and about on such a rainy day?
You're gonna catch a cold.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey <MYNAME>. This is a cold
winter isn't it? I don't want to get
out of bed in the morning.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? Tony keeps
going on and on about the snow. That
boy just won't stop talking about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, I guess I was like that too when
I was a kid. What about you?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You really shouldn't take a storm like
this lightly.
<PAGE>
That scrawny body of yours might just
get blown away. Go home where it's
safe!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You really shouldn't underestimate
snowstorms or you'll find yourself in
the hospital.
<PAGE>
Don't blame me if you slip on the snow
and get hurt. Go home where it's safe!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard you're in a relationship now.
Nice job, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
You should experience as much as you can
while you're still young. Good luck!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You run around the forest a lot don't
you? What are you doing?
<PAGE>
Me? Tony eats a lot, so I'm here looking
for materials and gathering more food
for him.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you've got some good materials, I
think they might help me come up with
some design ideas.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. Don't forget that
even things that seem useless now might
come in handy later.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's fun to walk around here, isn't it?
I come here all the time, but I never
get tired of it.
<PAGE>
It's fun because when I walk through the
forest, I can just feel how brimming
with life the forest is.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm having trouble with the sculpture
I'm working on. I thought coming here
might give me ideas, but it hasn't.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I don't know though. Coming here makes
me feel like it isn't such a big deal.
I'll just keep trying. It'll work out.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's right. I need to pray at the
spring here. According to legend,
your wishes will come true.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The air on a farm air is different
somehow. It feels familiar and friendly.
It must be fun to live on a farm.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey <MYNAME>. You should have Tony
help you out on the farm sometime. He
always seems like he wants to.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The mine is a treasure chest of
materials that are needed for the
blueprints. You should visit often.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just like you <MYNAME>, I come
here often.
<PAGE>
When I'm coming up with blueprint ideas,
I need to think about what types of
materials I should use.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town sure feels lonely. I'm going to
keep making blueprints. <MYNAME>,
it's up to you to keep building.
<PAGE>
If we keep at it, more people will come.
Let's do our best. I'm counting on you.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's it going? We've got some more
people now haven't we?
<PAGE>
You're doing good, <MYNAME>. Keep
it up.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become much livelier
hasn't it?
<PAGE>
I've come up with a lot of blueprints,
and you've worked really hard.
<PAGE>
But we still haven't built the perfect
town just yet. We're almost there, so
let's keep at it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's certainly become a great town.
Everyone looks so cheerful. We've got a
beautiful park and wonderful buildings.
<PAGE>
I think your dream has come true,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You said you're going to fix up the town
right? I like your attitude. I can help
you out.
<PAGE>
If you need blueprints, come to my
place. You can count on me.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm having trouble coming up with
designs, I relieve stress by carving
sculptures. It works wonders.
<PAGE>
I carve sculptures using a hammer and
chisel. When I chisel into a sculpture,
all my stress just disappears.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To design blueprints, I have to keep
staring at the material until I come up
with an idea that truly satisfies me.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Tony is full of mischief. I don't know
who he gets it from.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But they're childish pranks. It's not
really anything to get that mad about.
I guess it's proof that he's healthy.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want Tony to grow up to be an honest
man who doesn't lie. That's the way a
man should be.
<PAGE>
There's so much I need to teach him
every single day.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People have always said that I'm like a
man. And I have to admit they aren't
wrong.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But that doesn't change the fact that
I'm a woman. It wouldn't hurt for people
to consider my feelings a bit.
<PAGE>
You agree, don't you <MYNAME>?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've been thinking that you've got what
it takes to make the things in my
blueprints like they're supposed to be.
<PAGE>
I'm putting my trust in you. If you let
me down, you'll regret it. So keep up
the good work.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seafood omelet rice? You're quite the
cook aren't you? This isn't an easy dish
to pull off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Wow, this is good. I'm impressed.
Even restaurants can't manage flavor
like this. 
<PAGE>
Thanks for the wonderful meal,
<MYNAME>. It was delicious.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? It's just what I wanted!
Have you been spying on me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ha ha ha! I'm just kidding. Thanks,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! Is that a present for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I feel bad saying this about a gift, but
I don't really like this. I don't even
want it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
How could you bring me something like
this! This is worse than one of Tony's
pranks! Just sit there, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I'm going to have to lecture you so that
you never do something like this again.
Hey! Don't run away!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Soft chocolates? I'm sorry <MYNAME>,
but I can't stand these things.
<PAGE>
Can I give these to Tony? I'm sorry, but
I can't eat them.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! Thank you. Having this much food
will really come in handy.
<PAGE>
And I know that it'll be good since it's
from your farm.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha! This is too big to be real!
Ah, my stomach hurts from laughing
so hard.
<PAGE>
Is this really from your farm? Well, I
guess I'll know once I try it. Thanks,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's alright, <MYNAME>. You
don't need to give me a present. You
should take it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've given me so much enough already.
You don't have to go so far out of your
way for me.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this perhaps a birthday present for
me?
<PAGE>
And it's seafood omelet rice!
<MYNAME>, you're the best. This is
absolutely delicious!
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. That was a great gift.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this supposed to be a birthday
present? Ha ha ha! That's cute.
<PAGE>
How wonderful. Thanks for picking
something I like.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's sweet of you to give me something
I like on my birthday. Thanks. I'll take
it!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this a birthday present for me? Wow,
thanks.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is this supposed to be a birthday
present? I don't like it.
<PAGE>
It's a birthday present, so I'll take it
this time, but next time don't give me
something like this, okay?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is this supposed to be? A birthday
present? That's ridiculous!
<PAGE>
Sit down! You're getting a lecture so
that you never do this again! Hey! Don't
run away!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
A birthday present? Oh, soft chocolates.
I just can't stand these things.
<PAGE>
I know they're a birthday present, and
I'm sorry, but can I give these to Tony?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Something nice and big from the farm
on my birthday? That's just like you,
<MYNAME>. Thanks.
<PAGE>
The stuff from your farm is delicious.
I'm really grateful.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha! This is too big to be real!
I can't believe this is my birthday
present!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Is this really from your farm? If I use
a little at a time, it'll probably last
a month!
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thanks, <MYNAME>. I love it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
She really is loud. I don't know how she
manages to keep all that energy in that
tiny body.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's up with this hen's neck? It's
always moving! It's fun just to watch
it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! This bird is huge! I've never seen
anything like it. You've definitely
raised her well.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog has so much energy! Very cute.
Kind of reminds me of Tony.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog is a little too fat. Look at
that jiggly stomach. Hm, it actually
feels kind of nice though.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a good looking dog! Farm dogs are
a different stock than regular ones.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you walking this dog? You need to
get this dog out for walks more.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love cat paws. I could keep touching
these paws forever. They feel so good.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fat cats are so cute. I want to take
this one home with me.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I didn't know cat hair could grow this
long. It's amazing.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa. This cat is heavy, probably as
heavy as Tony. You need to get this cat
some exercise.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, aren't you charming? I hope you're
not expecting something in exchange for
these flowers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, anyway, thank you. They are 
lovely.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. Is this for me? Are you sure it
isn't for Tony? Well, I guess I'll take
it then.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? What's this? Where did this come
from? I wouldn't show this to many
people if I were you.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, I haven't thought about those days
in a long time.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
These birds will be perfect models for
my sculptures. I'm really starting to
feel like making something.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tony was chasing this poor thing around.
I'm so sorry about my blockheaded son.
<PAGE>
Aww, it licked my hand. I guess that
means it forgives me. Thank you.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here, <MYNAME>. This is for you.
<PAGE>
What are you looking all surprised for?
It's your birthday isn't it? I hope you
like it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard it's your birthday today. I feel
bad that I forgot to get you a present.
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. Where have you been? It's
been awhile, hasn't it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Leave the blueprint-making to me. I'll
draw up plans for whatever you need, and
even for things you don't!
<PAGE>
If you don't have any business here,
you had better run along as you'll just
be in the way.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you need? I'm eating now, so can
you come by later?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like how stone benches are so sturdy
and feel so natural. It looks so
comfortable.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you want some help stacking the
bricks around here?
<PAGE>
What? They're fine the way they are?
Okay. It kind of looks like some kind of
art exhibit.
<PAGE>
It seems kind of incomplete to me
though.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Chairs made from logs are nice aren't
they? Did you make this?
<PAGE>
It's got a rustic, natural feel to it.
I really like it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, it's a stone lantern. You don't see
those around here very often.
<PAGE>
It's very well made. Nice job.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a rather old style for a pillar,
but you followed the blueprint well.
<PAGE>
I always feel like stone pillars look so
sturdy and dignified.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a totem pole isn't it? It's a
bit small, but it's pretty interesting.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an impressive totem pole. I find
totem poles interesting because of my
line of work.
<PAGE>
It really is nicely made. I wouldn't be
surprised if there were really spirits
in it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the dog statue that I designed
isn't it? You did a very good job.
<PAGE>
Even now, it looks like it's waiting for
its master.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, look at that. It's a statue of the
sun. I think I'm going to try to absorb
some solar energy.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a unique statue. A maiden
holding a spear. I've never made
something like this.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a unique statue. A maiden
holding a shield. I've never made
something like this.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a cute fountain. I like how the
water comes out of the duck's mouth.
<PAGE>
I design fountains too. I like the idea
of using an animal as a model.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a luxurious, wonderful fountain.
It's a bit extravagant, but I'd say it's
worth it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a well-designed bridge. I don't
design bridges, but I find this one
interesting.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the well I designed isn't it?
It looks pretty good.
<PAGE>
Even if it doesn't have water, I think
it makes the town look nicer.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a unique little item. It's a
pine decoration, right?
<PAGE>
What are they for? I need to look that
up sometime.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why is there an obelisk here?
<PAGE>
These aren't easy to make. Obelisks are
rare, so you should treat this with
care.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this some kind of mechanical lion
vehicle? You certainly do have something
interesting here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Do you ride this around town? I know
everyone's got a childish side, but this
takes the cake

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a small tree-lined path isn't
it? I can tell because I designed it.
<PAGE>
I'm happy to see that you did quite a
good job.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a tree-lined path isn't it? I
can tell because I designed it.
<PAGE>
I'm happy to see that you did a pretty
good job. It has a nice atmosphere.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a large tree-lined path isn't
it? I can tell because I designed it.
<PAGE>
It must have been very hard to make.
It has a fantastic atmosphere though.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo grows really tall very quickly. I
just love how straight it is.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So this is the topiary that I designed,
eh? You did a good job. Then again, I
imagine a ball topiary isn't too tricky.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So this is the topiary that I designed,
eh? You did a good job. 
<PAGE>
It's not easy to make a double ball, but
you pulled it off nicely. You'll make a
good craftsman.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a lion topiary, isn't it?
It's not my design, but it's really
well done.
<PAGE>
It looks like it could jump out at us
at any moment.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a mammoth topiary, isn't it?
It's not my design, but it's really
well done.
<PAGE>
It's quite impressive.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo grows really tall very quickly. I
just love how straight it is.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Because Gingko trees look different in
each season, they really help you enjoy
the changing seasons.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know what it is about palm
trees, but they always make me feel
relaxed.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, this cow ornament is very well
made.
<PAGE>
I love looking at animals, and this cow
is so realistic that it almost looks
like it's alive.
<PAGE>
Did you make this, <MYNAME>? It's
quite impressive.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, this sheep ornament is very well
made.
<PAGE>
I love looking at animals, and this 
sheep is so realistic that it almost
looks like it's alive.
<PAGE>
Did you make this, <MYNAME>? It's
quite impressive.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, this chicken ornament is really
well made.
<PAGE>
I love looking at animals, and this
chicken is so realistic that it almost
looks like it's alive.
<PAGE>
Did you make this, <MYNAME>? It's
quite impressive.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, this horse ornament is really well
made.
<PAGE>
I love looking at animals, and this
horse is so realistic that it almost
looks like it's alive.
<PAGE>
Did you make this, <MYNAME>? It's
quite impressive.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a tricycle pot isn't it? That's
pretty interesting.
<PAGE>
It's cool how you've effectively reused
scrap parts.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the curved arbor that I designed
isn't it? You did a good job.
<PAGE>
Now you've just got to think about what
colors you want and add some flowers.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the stone fence that I designed
isn't it? I like the sense of weight
that it has.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an interesting fence. And is
that a sheep pattern? 
<PAGE>
It's pretty realistic. It looks like
there's a row of sheep lined up here.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stone walls can be kind of imposing, but
I like things that give you a sense of
history.
<PAGE>
Here's the design I came up with. What
do you think? I bet you like it!
Now's not the time for presents.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can be unkempt when I'm working, but I
visit the hair salon sometimes. Despite
appearances, I am a lady after all.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not often but I do occasionally
think about visiting the tailor's and
getting dressed up in something nice.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've heard the restaurant serves a good
omelet rice, but they don't have it with
seafood. I'll just make a special order.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I try going to the travel agent
sometimes, but I always end up feeling
like traveling would be too much hassle.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not too fond of sweets, but the tea
set at the tea house is good. I
recommend for relaxing after work.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not fond of moving. It's such a
pain.
<PAGE>
I try not to have too much stuff, but it
seems like I just keep getting more and
more things without even realizing it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has grown to this size because
of all the hard work you've put into it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There seem to be more Western style
buildings around here. It's a little too
orderly and uninteresting.
<PAGE>
Towns are more interesting when they're
more jumbled.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having more Eastern style buildings is
relaxing isn't it? It's very tasteful.
I really like it.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having a town with an exotic feel to it
is delightful. It makes an everyday walk
into something a bit more exciting.
